text: A prospective hospital - based case - control study was implemented in the Pediatric department of Gabriel Touré University Hospital at Bamako , Mali , between July 2011 - December 2012 . Cases were children with radiologically - confirmed pneumonia ; Controls were hospitalized children without respiratory features , matched for age and period . Respiratory specimens , were collected to identify 19 viruses and 5 bacteria . Whole blood was collected from cases only . Factors associated with pneumonia were assessed by multivariate logistic regression .
